overview:
Brian is a Vice President of BrandJourney Capital and Mantucket Capital. He is predominately responsible for sourcing and evaluating investment opportunities, conducting due diligence, and overseeing various portfolio company activities.

Brian was formerly an investment banker at St. Charles Capital, a middle market investment bank focused on mergers and acquisitions, private capital formation and related advisory services. At St. Charles Capital he was involved in the sale and financing of numerous community banks, consumer companies and various other closely held businesses.

Prior to joining St. Charles Capital, Brian was a Principal at Mankwitz Kurtz Investments, a middle market private equity firm based in Denver, Colorado. At Mankwitz Kurtz Investments, Brian completed transactions in the consumer products, luxury services, financial services, software, real estate and telecom industries. Previously, he had experience drafting and negotiating legislative documents for Jefferson Government Relations, a lobbying firm in Washington, DC.

Brian received a Masters in Accounting and Finance from the London School of Economics with honors, and graduated Magna Cum Laude from Vanderbilt University. He is actively involved and holds leadership positions in numerous business and community associations.
